sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_c6fe55d0db6fc490d033df8b4b961939
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>x_pisn_sp_captcha.recaptchaCallback.js</name><script><![CDATA[function recaptchaCallback() {
    var scope = angular.element($('main.body').find(".sp-captcha-form-element")).scope();
    scope.$apply(function() {
        scope.c.checkCap();
    });
}]]></script><script_name>recaptchaCallback.js</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>fabio</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-10 12:13:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>c6fe55d0db6fc490d033df8b4b961939</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_pisn_sp_captcha.recaptchaCallback.js</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SP Captcha Form Element" source="x_pisn_sp_captcha">3ad45e12db9fc850d033df8b4b961983</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SP Captcha Form Element">3ad45e12db9fc850d033df8b4b961983</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_c6fe55d0db6fc490d033df8b4b961939</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>fabio</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-10 12:14:36</sys_updated_on><ui_type>10</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
